root.name: Baltron
root.description: OverviewBaltron is a side-scrolling shoot-em-up that plays similarly to Defender, in that there's a small mini-map "radar" at the top that tells the player where the enemies are. It also superficially resembles Konami's Gradius, or Irem's R-Type, but lacks the (then) in-depth upgrade systems of those two games.
